description: Participants in the exhibition are specialists in their field, showing their talent and dedication in the production of fine books. From the latest printing and papermaking to the traditional craft of bookbinding.

factsheet.heading: Those exhibiting
paragraphs:
The participants in the exhibition are specialists in their fields, each showing a different aspect of their talents and
the dedication that goes into the production of fine books. From the latest printing and papermaking technology to
the traditional craft of bookbinding, each exhibitor plays an important role in preserving the book as a living part of
our cultural heritage.
The exhibition also highlights the importance of preserving skills for the future, and will include:

* An exhibition by apprentices from the Royal Bindery at Windsor.
* Books Illustrated
*Extraordinary Editions and The Clear Vue Publishing Partnership
*G.F Smith
*Pureprint

location.address: Stationers' Hall, Ave Maria Lane, London
travel_info: Train: Cannon Street, Farringdon, Blackfriars, Liverpool Street

name: Stationers' Hall Fine Books and Hand Binding Exhibition
